bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Culpeper County was formed in 1749 from Orange County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1783-1871, of Culpeper County consist of officials' bonds (1834, 1835), court papers related to judgments (1826, 1830, 1837), papers related to settlement of Ambrose Powell's estate (1791), a copy of Edward Leavell's will (1783), and a court order related to the probate of John P. Kelly's will (1871.)

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Culpeper County records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. See the Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm

Culpeper County is one of Virginia's Lost Records Localities. Additional Culpeper County Court Records may be found in the Virginia Lost Records Localities Collection at the Library of Virginia. Search the Lost Records Localities Database found at the Library of Virginia web site.
